archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0425
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a BSS solution, I should track and show potential customers. (Note this may be info added by Vodafone or other customers)

properties.value: OOTB its a lifecycle of the customer. A customer can create a prospect? Customer creating prospect for Horizion 2 to be discussed during customer structure session

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
